page.title: 04TOURISM 1
page.content: Although{Kirkcaldy}is not a tourist town as such, its amenities make it a pleasant place to visit. This area is the main shopping centre of Fife,with many large shops and recently opened indoor shopping malls. In the 97 acres of the{Beveridge {Park}there are all the facilities for a family day out.There are bowling greens and tennis courts, a boating lake, a children's play area, and facilities for picnics and outdoor sports as well as many pleasant walks. Another open space well worth a visit is the{War Memorial Gardens in the centre of the town.This is a most attractive place to sit on a summer's day and view some of the town's most attractive buildings.
